name: blockchain-generator
description: A full-stack blockchain generator with real-time UI, Node.js backend and Next.js frontend
author: snj-adhikari

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.reset: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json
scripts.vercel-build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
